title: Hobbies & Interests
part1: Let's talk about your free time. What do you enjoy doing?
How did you become interested in that hobby?
What kind of hobbies are popular in your country?
Do you think it's important for people to have hobbies?

cue_card_points: how long you have been doing it
and explain why you enjoy this hobby.

part3: Do you think hobbies can have a positive or negative impact on a person's work or studies?
Some people's hobbies are very dangerous. Why do you think they do them?
Do you believe that technology has changed the way people spend their free time?
